definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This is a unique opportunity to get a progressive politician to be the president of the council.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個令進步政治家成爲理事會主席得大好機會。

sentences.english: You can see with half an eye that there is a difference between a politician and a statesman.
sentences.chinese: 你可一望而知，政客與政治家是有不同之處。

sentences.english: During the Warring States period there was another statesman called Su Qin.
sentences.chinese: 戰國時期還有一個著名的政治家叫蘇秦。

sentences.english: They show a good deal more common sense than the politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他們展示的常識出比政治家多得多。

sentences.english: The statesman is ostracize because he betray many top secrets.
sentences.chinese: 那個政治家因泄漏許多國家最高機密而被放逐。

sentences.english: Liuyuxi is an outstanding statesman and exiling poem in middle of Tang Dynasty .
sentences.chinese: 劉禹錫是中唐時期傑出的政治家兼貶謫詩人。

sentences.english: Politicians need to work to provide day-care and child-rearing support.
sentences.chinese: 政治家們需要努力在日託和養育孩子方面提供支持。

sentences.english: What he can do afterall he is also a politician.
sentences.chinese: 他怎麼能這麼做，起碼他還是個政治家啊。

sentences.english: What are the attributes of the statesman?
Na received support from another prominent female politician, Park Geun-hye.
sentences.chinese: 羅卿瑗得到了另外一位傑出的女政治家朴槿惠的支持。

sentences.english: The banks of the world are full of the money of our statesmen.
sentences.chinese: 全世界銀行裏已經碓滿了我國政治家的錢”。

sentences.english: A: Let’s just hope the politicians don’t figure out a way to spend it.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們巴望政治家們不會想着法子把它用掉吧。

sentences.english: That politician cries wolf in every speech he makes.
sentences.chinese: 那個政治家在他的每篇演說中都虛發警報。

sentences.english: A statesman cannot afford to be a moralist.
sentences.chinese: 政治家無法成爲道德家。

sentences.english: The statesman retired as the mayor of New York.
sentences.chinese: 那位政治家退戚時是紐約市市少。

sentences.english: How do we educate potential statesmen?
sentences.chinese: 我們如何教育一位政治家？

definition: jurist/member of the pre-Han legalist school
